document_name: Government Regulation of the Republic of Indonesia Number 57 of 2016 concerning Amendments to Government Regulation Number 71 of 2014 concerning Protection and Management of Peat Ecosystems
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/IDN/2016/IDN-2016-01-01-Government Regulation of the Republic of Indonesia Number 57 of 2016 concerning Amendments to Government Regulation Number 71 of 2014 concerning Protection and Management of Peat Ecosystems_10f88a30b008e70eab87abf22a701cc1.pdf
document_description: This Government Regulation, issued under Law 32/2009 on Environmental Protection and Management, makes provision for the protection and management of peatland ecosystems and sets out rules and regulations for monitoring and compliance.
